data.message: What,yelawolf,like woof woof trottin around on his hoof hoof,he's a wanna be shady,in his next life maybe,just the clip and I'm gone crazy,can't see him bein round long,lookin left right ya he's gone,got a whole notebook that'll put him to shame,nothin like this here cause this comments lame,but even I can write better,give me an address and I'll give him a new song in each letter,don't mean to be dissin but to him I'll never listen...
